A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The death of Star Wars. Semi-interesting sci-fi movie\, if you can get past all the plot holes and the many annoyingly convenient coincidences. The reality is\, it was an attempt to re-write Star Wars\, by infusing it with the writers personal views and politics. The Last Jedi turned out to be The Last Star Wars Movie I was interested in watching. There's no New Hope for JJ trying to scrounge the mess that was left for him to salvage for making episode 9.
